title: Old man possum
brief_description: Gives details of the animal, its characteristics and its food habits. Compares the Australian marsupial with the American opossum. Shows types of possums, including gliding phalangers of all sizes, the ring-tailed possum, the cuscus and many others. Also shows the research work on the physiology of marsupials being carried out on the brush-tailed possum at Sydney University.
